name: BlackMonk
overview:
BlackMonk is a powerful, scalable & highly customizable content management system (CMS) for building web portals. BlackMonk powers online newspapers, magazine sites, business directories, city portals, community portals and more; its modular design and flexible architecture allows customization of functionalities with ease and convenience.

BlackMonk CMS offers a superior user-experience & the widest range of functionalities to help you get started with just about any type of web portal project. BlackMonk is equipped with 20+ web applications such as: ecommerce, business directory, classifieds, user management, etc. typically used for deploying heavy-duty sites.

Following are the key features of BlackMonk CMS:

  • Completely customizable so you can build anything

  • Deep rooted social infrastructure to facilitate seamless content sharing

  • Supports user generated content

  • Multiple revenue streams including: banner ads, promotional

content, business directory & classifieds, ecommerce & deals and events

  • Third party feeds integration to make your website a ‘one stop source’ for all information

  • Built using best of the breed technology for scalability and great user experience

  • Fully optimized for search engines

  • Easy to manage and moderate

  • Built-in reports so you have all information at your fingertips

  • Straight licensing terms + full
